alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Logan; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 6:59PM CDT until April 27 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT/745 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHERN WALLACE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL KANSAS... SOUTHEASTERN CHEYENNE AND WESTERN THOMAS COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL KANSAS... SOUTHWESTERN RAWLINS AND SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 557 PM MDT/657 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Bird City to 6 miles southeast of Goodland to 12 miles south of Kanorado, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Wind gusts to 60 mph are being measured well behind the initial outflow boundary at the Goodland Airport. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Wallace County in west central Kansas, southeastern Cheyenne and western Thomas Counties in northwestern Kansas, northwestern Logan County in west central Kansas, southwestern Rawlins and Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas, including the following locations... Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 1 and 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Logan; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace
